Bootstrap 5 placeholder files for the theme.

Files:
- css/bootstrap.min.css (imports Bootstrap CSS from CDN)
- js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js (loads Bootstrap bundle from CDN)

To replace with local copies, download:
- https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@latest/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css
- https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@latest/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js

Then overwrite the two files above with the downloaded contents.
